A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sad to see the direction episodes VII to IX are going. It’s a decent 2 movies in 1 feature. Good visual effects\, but the storyline is so bad\, and the acting.... well\, you don’t watch these movies with an academy award expectation\, but they could at least try to make it more realistic. I had to watch the originals after watching this movie. I miss the Sith and the Jedi. This is just some crowd pleaser happily ever after space movie.
